sections.heading: Corporation Without Notice of Infancy May Treat Infant as Having Capacity to Vote, Transfer, Etc
sections.text:
Section 10-6-1

Corporation Without Notice of Infancy May Treat Infant as Having Capacity to Vote, Transfer, Etc.

All provisions of Title 10 have been repealed or transferred to Title 10A, effective January 1, 2011.

(Acts 1957, No. 546, p. 766, ยง1.)

sections.heading: Infant Not Entitled to Disaffirm as Against Corporation Without Notice of Infancy.

Section 10-6-2

sections.heading: Right of Infant to Receive Dividends in Own Name.

sections.heading: Effect of Chapter on Transfers to Minors Act, Etc.
sections.text:
